verses.text: These \w are|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H1697"\w* \w words|strong="H1697"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Nehemiah|strong="H5166"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Hacaliah|strong="H2446"\w*: \w In|strong="H8141"\w* \w the|strong="H1697"\w* \w month|strong="H2320"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Chislev|strong="H3691"\w*,\f + \fr 1:1 \ft Chislev is the ninth month of the Hebrew lunar calendar, usually occurring within the months of November and December.\f* \w in|strong="H8141"\w* \w the|strong="H1697"\w* \w twentieth|strong="H6242"\w* \w year|strong="H8141"\w*, \w while|strong="H1961"\w* \w I|strong="H1697"\w* \w was|strong="H1961"\w* \w in|strong="H8141"\w* \w the|strong="H1697"\w* \w citadel|strong="H1002"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Susa|strong="H7800"\w*,

\w Hanani|strong="H2607"\w*, \w one|strong="H4480"\w* \w of|strong="H4480"\w* \w my|strong="H5921"\w* brothers, arrived \w with|strong="H5921"\w* men \w from|strong="H4480"\w* \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*. \w So|strong="H4480"\w* \w I|strong="H5921"\w* \w questioned|strong="H7592"\w* \w them|strong="H5921"\w* \w about|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w remnant|strong="H7604"\w* \w of|strong="H4480"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w Jews|strong="H3064"\w* \w who|strong="H1931"\w* \w had|strong="H3063"\w* \w survived|strong="H7604"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* exile, \w and|strong="H3063"\w* \w also|strong="H3389"\w* \w about|strong="H5921"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*.

\w And|strong="H1419"\w* \w they|strong="H8033"\w* told \w me|strong="H4480"\w*, “\w The|strong="H4480"\w* \w remnant|strong="H7604"\w* \w who|strong="H7604"\w* \w survived|strong="H7604"\w* \w the|strong="H4480"\w* exile \w are|strong="H8179"\w* \w there|strong="H8033"\w* \w in|strong="H7604"\w* \w the|strong="H4480"\w* \w province|strong="H4082"\w*, \w in|strong="H7604"\w* \w great|strong="H1419"\w* \w trouble|strong="H7451"\w* \w and|strong="H1419"\w* \w disgrace|strong="H2781"\w*. \w The|strong="H4480"\w* \w wall|strong="H2346"\w* \w of|strong="H8179"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w* \w is|strong="H7451"\w* \w broken|strong="H6555"\w* \w down|strong="H6555"\w*, \w and|strong="H1419"\w* \w its|strong="H6555"\w* \w gates|strong="H8179"\w* \w are|strong="H8179"\w* \w burned|strong="H3341"\w* \w with|strong="H3389"\w* \w fire|strong="H3341"\w*.”

\w When|strong="H1961"\w* \w I|strong="H3117"\w* \w heard|strong="H8085"\w* \w these|strong="H8085"\w* \w words|strong="H1697"\w*, \w I|strong="H3117"\w* \w sat|strong="H3427"\w* \w down|strong="H3427"\w* \w and|strong="H3117"\w* \w wept|strong="H1058"\w*. \w I|strong="H3117"\w* \w mourned|strong="H1058"\w* \w for|strong="H6440"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w*, \w fasting|strong="H6684"\w* \w and|strong="H3117"\w* \w praying|strong="H6419"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w God|strong="H8064"\w* \w of|strong="H3117"\w* \w heaven|strong="H8064"\w*.

\w Then|strong="H3372"\w* \w I|strong="H3068"\w* said: “\w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, \w God|strong="H3068"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w heaven|strong="H8064"\w*, \w the|strong="H8104"\w* \w great|strong="H1419"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w awesome|strong="H3372"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w* \w who|strong="H3068"\w* \w keeps|strong="H8104"\w* \w His|strong="H8104"\w* \w covenant|strong="H1285"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* loving \w devotion|strong="H2617"\w* \f + \fr 1:5 \ft Forms of the Hebrew chesed are translated here and in most cases throughout the Scriptures as loving devotion; the range of meaning includes love, goodness, kindness, faithfulness, and mercy, as well as loyalty to a covenant.\f* \w with|strong="H3068"\w* those \w who|strong="H3068"\w* \w love|strong="H2617"\w* \w Him|strong="H8104"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w keep|strong="H8104"\w* \w His|strong="H8104"\w* \w commandments|strong="H4687"\w*,

\w let|strong="H4994"\w* \w Your|strong="H5921"\w* \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w open|strong="H6605"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w Your|strong="H5921"\w* ears \w attentive|strong="H7183"\w* \w to|strong="H3478"\w* \w hear|strong="H8085"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w prayer|strong="H8605"\w* \w that|strong="H3117"\w* \w I|strong="H3117"\w*, \w Your|strong="H5921"\w* \w servant|strong="H5650"\w*, \w now|strong="H4994"\w* \w pray|strong="H6419"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w You|strong="H6440"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w night|strong="H3915"\w* \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w Your|strong="H5921"\w* \w servants|strong="H5650"\w*, \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w Israelites|strong="H3478"\w*. \w I|strong="H3117"\w* \w confess|strong="H3034"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w sins|strong="H2403"\w* \w that|strong="H3117"\w* \w we|strong="H3068"\w* \w Israelites|strong="H3478"\w* \w have|strong="H1961"\w* \w committed|strong="H2398"\w* \w against|strong="H5921"\w* \w You|strong="H6440"\w*. \w Both|strong="H5921"\w* \w I|strong="H3117"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w my|strong="H8085"\w* \w father|strong="H1121"\w*’s \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w have|strong="H1961"\w* \w sinned|strong="H2398"\w*.

We \w have|strong="H5650"\w* behaved \w corruptly|strong="H2254"\w* \w against|strong="H6680"\w* \w You|strong="H6680"\w* \w and|strong="H4872"\w* \w have|strong="H5650"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w kept|strong="H8104"\w* \w the|strong="H8104"\w* \w commandments|strong="H4687"\w*, \w statutes|strong="H2706"\w*, \w and|strong="H4872"\w* \w ordinances|strong="H4941"\w* \w that|strong="H5650"\w* \w You|strong="H6680"\w* \w gave|strong="H6680"\w* \w Your|strong="H8104"\w* \w servant|strong="H5650"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*.

\w Remember|strong="H2142"\w*, \w I|strong="H1697"\w* \w pray|strong="H4994"\w*, \w the|strong="H6680"\w* \w word|strong="H1697"\w* \w that|strong="H5971"\w* \w You|strong="H6680"\w* \w commanded|strong="H6680"\w* \w Your|strong="H6680"\w* \w servant|strong="H5650"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w when|strong="H4872"\w* \w You|strong="H6680"\w* \w said|strong="H1697"\w*, ‘If \w you|strong="H6680"\w* \w are|strong="H5971"\w* \w unfaithful|strong="H4603"\w*, \w I|strong="H1697"\w* \w will|strong="H5971"\w* \w scatter|strong="H6327"\w* \w you|strong="H6680"\w* \w among|strong="H5971"\w* \w the|strong="H6680"\w* \w nations|strong="H5971"\w*,

\w but|strong="H1961"\w* \w if|strong="H1961"\w* \w you|strong="H7725"\w* \w return|strong="H7725"\w* \w to|strong="H7725"\w* \w Me|strong="H7725"\w* \w and|strong="H7725"\w* \w keep|strong="H8104"\w* \w and|strong="H7725"\w* \w practice|strong="H6213"\w* \w My|strong="H8104"\w* \w commandments|strong="H4687"\w*, \w then|strong="H1961"\w* \w even|strong="H6213"\w* \w if|strong="H1961"\w* \w your|strong="H8104"\w* exiles \w have|strong="H1961"\w* \w been|strong="H1961"\w* \w banished|strong="H5080"\w* \w to|strong="H7725"\w* \w the|strong="H6213"\w* farthest horizon,\f + \fr 1:9 \ft Or to the extremity of the heavens\f* \w I|strong="H6213"\w* \w will|strong="H1961"\w* \w gather|strong="H6908"\w* \w them|strong="H7725"\w* \w from|strong="H7725"\w* \w there|strong="H8033"\w* \w and|strong="H7725"\w* \w bring|strong="H7725"\w* \w them|strong="H7725"\w* \w to|strong="H7725"\w* \w the|strong="H6213"\w* \w place|strong="H4725"\w* \w I|strong="H6213"\w* \w have|strong="H1961"\w* chosen \w as|strong="H1961"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w dwelling|strong="H7931"\w* \w for|strong="H6213"\w* \w My|strong="H8104"\w* \w Name|strong="H8034"\w*.’\f + \fr 1:9 \ft Deuteronomy 30:1–4\f*

\w They|strong="H1992"\w* \w are|strong="H1992"\w* \w Your|strong="H3027"\w* \w servants|strong="H5650"\w* \w and|strong="H1419"\w* \w Your|strong="H3027"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w*. \w You|strong="H3027"\w* \w redeemed|strong="H6299"\w* \w them|strong="H1992"\w* \w by|strong="H3027"\w* \w Your|strong="H3027"\w* \w great|strong="H1419"\w* \w power|strong="H3027"\w* \w and|strong="H1419"\w* \w mighty|strong="H2389"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*.

\w O|strong="H3068"\w* Lord, \w may|strong="H1961"\w* \w Your|strong="H5414"\w* ear \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w attentive|strong="H7183"\w* \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w my|strong="H5414"\w* \w prayer|strong="H8605"\w* \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w prayers|strong="H8605"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w Your|strong="H5414"\w* \w servants|strong="H5650"\w* \f + \fr 1:11 \ft Literally to the prayer of Your servant and to the prayer of Your servants\f* \w who|strong="H5650"\w* \w delight|strong="H2655"\w* \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w revere|strong="H3372"\w* \w Your|strong="H5414"\w* \w name|strong="H8034"\w*. \w Give|strong="H5414"\w* \w Your|strong="H5414"\w* \w servant|strong="H5650"\w* \w success|strong="H6743"\w* \w this|strong="H2088"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w*, \w I|strong="H3117"\w* \w pray|strong="H4994"\w*, \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w grant|strong="H5414"\w* \w him|strong="H5414"\w* \w mercy|strong="H7356"\w* \w in|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w sight|strong="H6440"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w this|strong="H2088"\w* \w man|strong="H2088"\w*.” (\w At|strong="H3117"\w* \w that|strong="H3117"\w* \w time|strong="H3117"\w* \w I|strong="H3117"\w* \w was|strong="H8034"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w cupbearer|strong="H4945"\w* \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w*.)
